title: Suche eine Team
body:
Hey Im 14 my name is Seraphin (I3lackBlub)

Im main Adc and Top lane. Im good with Draven , Vayne , Lucian , Darius and Rengo.

Im silver 5 and this is my first Season^^

I have Skype and Teamspeak. And i can speak german to.{{champion:119}}

replies.body: You should better post your thread in the english forum, your search will be more succesfull there.
warum schreibst du den Post in Deutsch und den Text in englisch? auf einem deutschen Forum?
